name: Til' Undeath Do US Part
description:
Til Death Do Us Part is a 3D puzzle plat-former game that features two zombies hopelessly in love having to share their own limbs with each other to beat the levels.

Our two characters Stitches and Hope are two Zombies on the run from the mad scientist who created them. They must in turn work together to escape his lab and find some where safe to settle down.
